price: उनमें हमेशा रहने वाले होंगे, वे उससे स्थान बदलना नहीं चाहेंगे।
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبۡغُونَ عَنۡهَا حِوَلٗا

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yabghūna ʿanhā ḥiwalan
